game.name: 遥遥领先
game.shortDescription: You transmigrated back to the 1980s, you decided to start a business and accurately seized every opportunity for success. You hired legendary managers to work for you, allowing your products to dominate both the national and global markets. Eventually, you became a "far ahead" business legend.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You transmigrated back to the 1980s, you decided to start a business and accurately seized every opportunity for success. You hired legendary managers to work for you, allowing your products to dominate both the national and global markets. Eventually, you became a "far ahead" business legend.
